name: Infiltrators
description:
You are the gunner of the most advanced weapon known to mankind, the teleportation cannon. It is up to you to defend your village from the incoming infiltrators by teleporting bombs at them. Be sure to try and teleport the bombs directly into the infiltrators for maximum damage. Survive as long as you can while getting as many points as possible.

Source code: https://github.com/Msciortino17/ScoreSpace_Jam_2021
